flawed_nl_solution:
She splits her $960 profit in half to get $960 / 2 = $<<960/2=840>>840.
She receives a total donation of $310, so she now has $310 + $840 = $<<310+840=1150>>1150.
She needed only $610 so she has $1150 - $610 = $540 more than she needs.
#### 540

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 480, not 840. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
